reason.zh: 平仓BTC多头头寸，因鲸鱼持续卖出（Token Net Flow负值），资金费率微负（-0.0045%），且大规模多头爆仓（$455M）显示散户恐慌，但无明确鲸鱼买入支撑，熊市下风险过高。
reason.en: Close BTC long position due to continuous whale selling (negative Token Net Flow), slightly negative funding rate (-0.0045%), and massive long liquidations ($455M) indicating retail panic, but lack of clear whale buying support makes it too risky in a bear market.
